text: François Perigot (12 May 1926 – 7 January 2022) was a French businessman and trade unionist. He was President of the Conseil national du patronat français from 1986 to 1994 and President of the Mouvement des Entreprises de France from 1997 to 2005. Perigot died on 7 January 2022 at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French trade unionists Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Lyon
title: François Perigot
